name: Trail Blazer (Mpdacey)
description:
Play as a little flame as you work your way up a mountain lighting every torch on your path.
Light all 7 torches on your journey to activate the final torch to complete the game!
Everything but the music was created by me for the first UTAS game jam with the theme "new beginnings".

Music used:
Song: Netrum & Halvorsen - Phoenix [NCS Release]
Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds
Free Download/Stream: http://NCS.io/Phoenix
Watch: http://youtu.be/yH88qRmgkGI
